extension.name: Mbooth Module Manager
extension.description: Mbooth is an application to manage extensions on opencart. It uses XML files that list all the information about a module or theme. This module can download the extension or delete them. It can also update the opencart installation and keep trek of updates and install. It uses a backup restore system to rollback if an installtion was unsuccessful.
extension.author: Dreamvention
